title: Startup Founders Podcast – Episode 8
content: In this week's episode, I interview Aihui Ong, CEO and founder of Love With Food. She's led a pretty interesting life: she grew up in Singapore (where she sold car polish in high school), was an engineer for many years, and has even backpacked around the world. Remember to review the show on iTunes, share the show with your friends, and send us feedback or questions @markjsaldana on Twitter. Listen to the show now:  iTunes Stitcher RSS Feed Thanks for listening. I'll be back next Friday with another episode!
